definition: variant of 別緻|别致[bie2 zhi4]
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: Hua Hong NEC's booth attracted and impressed many visitors.
sentences.chinese: 华虹NEC新颖别致的展台吸引了众多参观者。

sentences.english: Entire design embodies the culture Smriti but the originality is unconventional.
sentences.chinese: 整个设计表现文化地传承而新奇别致。

sentences.english: An exquisite flower adorned her dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的上衣上别一枚别致的胸花做为点缀。

sentences.english: These porcelain plates have rather original designs on them.
sentences.chinese: 这些瓷盘的花纹很别致。

sentences.english: Each angel casts a special joy, that brings us all such cheer.
sentences.chinese: 每个天使发出别致的欢乐，带给所有人喝采。

sentences.english: But my fancy accordion might as well have been a cardboard box that afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 但是那天下午，我别致的手风琴好像变成了纸板盒。

sentences.english: Handpick some dandelions. They can be pretty when tied in a bunch with a ribbon.
sentences.chinese: 用丝带扎成一束，看起来会是一份非常别致的礼物。

sentences.english: The whole building is unique in sculpt and delicacy in carving skill, having strong feeling of Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 整座建筑造型别致，雕工精巧，具有浓郁的元代风格。

sentences.english: She wore a fine, brightly-colored green suit and her appearance reminds people of the spring.
sentences.chinese: 她身穿别致的绿色套装，犹如春天般生气盎然。

sentences.english: This radio set is unconventionally shaped.
sentences.chinese: 这个收音机样子很别致。

sentences.english: She is wearing a pert little hat.
sentences.chinese: 她头戴一顶小巧别致的帽子。

sentences.english: All teachers and students gathered together and enjoyed this exquisite music.
sentences.chinese: 全体师生欢聚一堂，共同欣赏这别致的乐章。

sentences.english: His portrait was mounted in the fancy frame.
sentences.chinese: 他的肖像用一个很别致的框裱起来。

sentences.english: A versatile new style for beach-to-street chic.
sentences.chinese: 一个通用的新的海滩街别致的风格。

sentences.english: Even if the look is rustic, it is still modern, sleek and chic.
sentences.chinese: 即使看似土气，但仍是时尚和别致的。

sentences.english: No one appreciates the very special genius of your conversation as the dog does.
sentences.chinese: 没有人可以像你的狗一样对你别致和特殊廪赋的赞赏。

definition: having a unique or distinctive style
style (of art or literature)/form/one's work style/moral character
to have quite a lasting charm
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
to hit on sth new (idiom); to display originality/to adopt an original approach
